item.title: For Pentesters
item.description: How I use the samma scanners to do recon when pentesting I was taskes to to a first pentest against a AWS hosted enviroment. This was a automated test to run before a more advaced pentest was planned. And the goals was to do a quick scan of the assets to catch any low fruits targets and then be able to resove them before the larger pentest was conducted. The setup To use a s base for the scanners a deployed a minkube Kubernetes on my local desktop.
